title: Generator circuit-breaker
fullText:
A generator of more than 15 kW/kVA capacity shall be provided with a circuit-breaker in its output fitted with each of the following:
(a)	Thermal overload protection (e.g. 15 s).
(b)	Short-circuit protection (e.g. 500 ms).
Generators for parallel operation shall be provided with reverse power protection. The tripping of the generator circuit-breaker shall be time delayed (e.g. 5 s to 15 s).
